public class CodeBlock

This class simply contains a code block (it is for encapsulated data only).

getDependency

public Dependency getDependency(java.util.Map conditions,
                                java.util.Map expressions,
                                java.util.Map variables)
Returns this CodeBlock as a Dependency.

Parses through the code of this codeblock looking for refrenced Conditions, Expressions, and Variables. When it finds one, it looks in the appropriate Map for the Object. If the object is found, it is added to the list of Dependencies.

Parsing code can be expensive if there is alot of code, so the number of calls to this method should be kept to a minimum.

Parameters:
conditions - The Map containing all Conditions on which this CodeBlock could potentialy be dependent. The keys should be the names of the Conditions, and the values stored should be the actual Conditions themselves.
expressions - The Map containing all Expressions on which this CodeBlock could potentialy be dependent. The keys should be the names of the Expressions, and the values stored should be the actual Expressions themselves.
variables - The Map containing all Variables on which this CodeBlock could potentialy be dependent. The keys should be the names of the Variables, and the values stored should be the actual Variables themselves.
Returns:
the Dependency object
